meanings.sent1: The girl wore a plaited hairband to keep her hair in place.
meanings.sent2: The plaited rope was strong enough to hold the heavy load.
meanings.sent3: The plaited pattern on the scarf made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The plaited vines in the jungle intertwined like a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The plaited fabric had a unique texture that caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate design of the plaited rug in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The plaited hair of the doll gave it a charming appearance.
meanings.sent3: The plaited dough for the bread looked like a mini rope.
meanings.sent4: The plaited strands of yarn created a beautiful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The plaited pattern on the dress added a touch of elegance to the outfit.
